main event: An oval orange light was sighted in Penns Park, Pennsylvania on 28 May 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared to change size, starting smaller and then getting larger,The observation lasted for approximately five minutes,The object's manner of discovery was visual,The object vanished after blinking out of sight,Preliminary analysis suggests it could be jet exhaust or a light reflection.
witness description: Captain, USN, United States Naval Air Development Center, Johnsville, Pa.
